Package com.arjuna.wst

Interface Volatile2PCParticipant

All Superinterfaces:
Participant
All Known Implementing Classes:
BridgeVolatileParticipant, SubordinateVolatile2PCStub, Volatile2PCStub
public interface Volatile2PCParticipant extends Participant
The Volatile2PCParticipant. This is the equivalent of the traditional synchronization protocol (the old PhaseZero and OutcomeNotification protocols.)
